documentation.text:
@dev This is CFA SuperApp that maintains at most one inflw from a sender at any moment.
 This can test the deposit allowance logic in the deleteFlow as a recipient.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory) pure external returns (struct ISuperfluid.Context memory)
function (contract ISuperfluidToken,address,address,bytes memory) external returns (bytes memory)
function (contract ISuperAgreement,bytes memory,bytes memory,bytes memory) external returns (bytes memory,bytes memory)

documentation.text:
@dev This is CFA SuperApp that refuses to close its outflow by its receiver.
 This test the logic that the app re-opens the same stream in the termination callback.
 In reality, the app would have to fund the app with enough tokens to not to be jailed due
 to low balance.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (contract ISuperfluidToken,address,int96,bytes memory) external returns (bytes memory)
function (contract ISuperAgreement,bytes memory,bytes memory) external returns (bytes memory)
function (contract ISuperfluidToken,address,int96,bytes memory) external returns (bytes memory)
function (contract ISuperAgreement,bytes memory,bytes memory,bytes memory) external returns (bytes memory,bytes memory)

documentation.text: @dev This is CFA SuperApp that refuses to accept any opening flow without reverting them.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory) pure external returns (struct ISuperfluid.Context memory)
function (contract ISuperfluidToken,address,address,bytes memory) external returns (bytes memory)
function (contract ISuperAgreement,bytes memory,bytes memory,bytes memory) external returns (bytes memory,bytes memory)

documentation.text: @dev This is CFA SuperApp that closes an updated flow.

devdoc.details: This is CFA SuperApp that refuses to close its outflow by its receiver. This test the logic that the app re-opens the same stream in the termination callback. In reality, the app would have to fund the app with enough tokens to not to be jailed due to low balance.
